name: Solar-Powered Backpack
description: A backpack equipped with a solar panel, allowing you to charge your devices on-the-go.

name: Wireless Earbuds
description: High-quality wireless earbuds with noise-cancellation and long battery life.

name: Smartwatch
description: A sleek smartwatch with fitness tracking, heart rate monitoring, and other advanced features.

name: Virtual Reality Headset
description: Experience immersive virtual reality with this high-end headset, perfect for gaming and entertainment.

name: Portable Bluetooth Speaker
description: Take your music anywhere with this portable Bluetooth speaker, featuring great sound quality and long battery life.

name: Smart Water Bottle
description: A water bottle that tracks your hydration and reminds you to drink more water throughout the day.

name: Electric Skateboard
description: A high-performance electric skateboard that lets you cruise around town in style.

name: Smart Thermostat
description: Control your home's temperature from anywhere with this smart thermostat, saving you money on your energy bill.

name: Smart Lock
description: Secure your home with this smart lock that allows you to control access to your property from your smartphone.

name: Portable Espresso Maker
description: Enjoy a fresh cup of espresso anywhere with this portable, battery-powered espresso maker.

name: Smart Jump Rope
description: A jump rope that tracks your workout data, helping you achieve your fitness goals faster.
